name: Float (itch) (Dennis Boersma)
description:
Float 

FPS / VR Adventure 

You are Isaac, a highly trained astronaut send on a repair mission into space. Everything goes well until you contact earth. Right in front of your eyes a disaster happens, leaving earth and your spaceship scarred. Can you repair your escape pod on time and get back to earth? This game can be played as a standard FPS or with VR. Inside the ship you can obtain multiple items and use them, one of them is a virtual VR helm 

Winner of the SAE Alumni Awards 2014 

https://alumni.sae.edu/2014/10/26/sae-alumni-awards-2014-the-winners/

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

SAE Amsterdam Student project 2013 

  • 3 months time 
  • 5 game students 
  • 6 audio students 
  • 1 programmer
